name: Gravitee
description:
Created by Ang Li, Hiu-Chun Lo, Arnav Gupta in 2016.

The player interact with zero gravity space and normal gravity space. Spaces with gravity are represented with a blue glow. Player must get used to the change of gravity to go through each stage. 

Press arrow keys to move. "Space" for jump.

Press "R" to restart the current level.
